Uses of Class
imagingbook.common.image.access.GridIndexer2D

  • Packages that use GridIndexer2D 
    Package Description
    imagingbook.common.image.access  

    • Uses of GridIndexer2D in imagingbook.common.image.access

      Subclasses of GridIndexer2D in imagingbook.common.image.access 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  GridIndexer2D.ExceptionIndexer
      This indexer throws an exception if coordinates outside image bounds are accessed.
      static class  GridIndexer2D.MirrorImageIndexer
      This indexer returns mirrored image values for coordinates outside the image bounds.
      static class  GridIndexer2D.NearestBorderIndexer
      This indexer returns the closest border pixel for coordinates outside the image bounds.
      static class  GridIndexer2D.ZeroValueIndexer
      This indexer returns -1 for coordinates outside the image bounds, indicating that a (predefined) default value should be used.
      Fields in imagingbook.common.image.access declared as GridIndexer2D 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected GridIndexer2D ImageAccessor.indexer  
      Methods in imagingbook.common.image.access that return GridIndexer2D 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static GridIndexer2D GridIndexer2D.create​(int width, int height, OutOfBoundsStrategy obs)
